SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.lonepulse.robozombie.annotation
Annotation Type Header

@Documented
@Target(value=PARAMETER)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Header

Identifies a header which should be sent with the request. If this annotation is placed on an instance of StringBuilder, its content will be replaced by any available response header with the same name.


Usage:

  1. Request Headers
    @GET("/repos/{user}/{repo}/git/blobs/{sha}")
Blob getBlob(@Header("Accept") String mediaType, ... );
  2. Response Headers
    @GET("/users/{user}/repos")
List<Repo> getRepos(@Header("X-RateLimit-Remaining") StringBuilder rateLimitRemaining, ... );


Since:
1.1.0

Version:
1.1.1

Author:
Lahiru Sahan Jayasinghe

Required Element Summary
 String value
          The name of the header.
 

Element Detail

value

public abstract String value

The name of the header.

Returns:
the header name

1.1.1
